title: A11Y Color Contrast Accessibility Validator
creator: A11Y Company
description: A free website compliance tool that displays the color contrast issues of a web page per WCAG Guidelines. The results display color combinations that fail the contrast checkpoints and provide specific recommendations on how to fix the issue to become compliant.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
